description: Change of use of land to open space, demolition and residential development comprising 12 affordable housing units (two x 2 beds, five x 5 beds and five x 3 beds), 9 private houses (one x 2 beds, two x 3 beds and part of six x 3 beds) and 16 apartments (part of eight x 2 bed flats, four x 1 bed flats and four x 2 bed flats).
site_name: Development at Joycott, Oakhurst, The Willows and Havering
site_number: Development at Joycott, Oakhurst, The Willows and Havering
